name: Rock Petting Simulator 2018 - the most useless game ever!
name_original: Rock Petting Simulator 2018 - the most useless game ever!
description:
RPS 2018? Yes, just what you wanted. Petting a rock while in a forest, while a creep is watching you? For completely free? YES! We will fulfill your dream, don't worry! You are just a few seconds away from playing the first beta version! Enjoy! 

version: beta v1.0
